original_text: And when he was come, the Jews which came down from Jerusalem stood round about, and laid many and grievous complaints against Paul, which they could not prove.
korean_text: 그가 나오매 예루살렘에서 내려온 유대인들이 둘러서서 여러 가지 중대한 사건으로 고발하되 능히 증거를 대지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: the Jews which came down from Jerusalem
and laid many and grievous complaints against Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 바울을 향해 많고 무거운 고소를 했으며
